member.summary: Initializes a default instance of the ChildSpecification class with the specified values.
member.param: The unique name identifier for the child.
The startup function called by the supervisor. Func{[environment],[supervisor ID],[agent type],[constructor args]}
The restart mode for this child.
The interval in milliseconds to wait for an exit signal on a supervisor stop before an environment.Kill is issued.
The type of the child agent.
Constructor arguments for agent construction.

member.summary: Gets the internal name used by the supervisor.

member.summary: Gets the restart mode for this child.

member.name: P:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.ChildSpecification.Shutdown
member.summary: Gets the interval in milliseconds to wait for an exit signal on a stop message sent by the supervisor before a forced kill is issued.
member.returns: The interval in milliseconds to wait for an exit signal on a stop message sent by the supervisor before a forced kill is issued. If 0, the supervisor will immediately kill the agent. If -1, the supervisor will wait until an exit signal is received.

member.name: P:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.ChildSpecification.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of the child.

member.summary: Gets an array of additional constructor arguments to be passed to the startup function.

member.name: P:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.ChildSpecification.Startup
member.summary: Gets the startup action to be performed on the child. This must result in the equivalent of a spawn link on the supervisor agent.

member.name: T:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.RestartMode
member.summary: Describes the restart mode for a supervisor child agent.

member.name: F:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.RestartMode.Permanent
member.summary: Child agent is always restarted.

member.name: F:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.RestartMode.Temporary
member.summary: Child agent is never restarted.

member.name: F:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.RestartMode.Transient
member.summary: Child agent is only restarted on abnormal termination (i.e. a fault).

member.name: T:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.RetrySpecification
member.summary: Represents a specification for retry criteria on message delivery.

member.name: M:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.RetrySpecification.#ctor(System.Int32,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Initializes a default instance of the RetrySpecification class with the specified values.
member.param: The number of attempts allowed before the message is lost.
The wait interval between resend attempts.

member.name: P:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.RetrySpecification.Attempts
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of attempts allowed before the message is considered lost. If the value is set to a number less than 0, the number of retry attempts will be unbounded.

member.name: P:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.RetrySpecification.WaitInterval
member.summary: Gets the interval of time to wait between resend attempts.

member.name: T:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.SupervisorRestartMode
member.summary: Describes the restart mode for a supervisor's child agents.

member.name: F:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.SupervisorRestartMode.OneForOne
member.summary: If a child agent terminates, only that agent is restarted.

member.name: F:Mercury.Messaging.Behaviors.SupervisorRestartMode.OneForAll
member.summary: If a child agent terminates, all remaining child agents are terminated then restarted, along with the originally terminated agent.
